data.question: What is the empirical formula of [CoL4]Et3NCH2Cl?
At what temperature was the X-ray crystal structure of [CoL4]Et3NCH2Cl determined?
What is the space group of H4L7.2MeCN?

What is the final R index (I>2sigma(I)) for the structure refinement of H4L7.2MeCN?

What is the formula weight of H4L7.2MeCN?
What is the melting point of H4L10?
What is the largest diff. peak and hole in the crystal structure of [CoL7]Et3NH?
Is the space group of [CoL4]Et3NCH2Cl P2(1)2(1)2(1)?
Was the crystal structure of H4L7.2MeCN determined at a temperature of 100 K?
Is the density of [CoL7]Et3NH greater than 1.3 Mg/m3?

Is the yield of H4L10 from [CoL9]NEt3CH2Cl over 90%?
Was the crystal system of [CoL10]NEt3CH2Cl determined to be triclinic?
Is the absorption correction method for [CoL4]Et3NCH2Cl named 'Multiscan'?
Is the formula weight of [CoL7]Et3NH exactly 1200?
What is the purpose of using LiAlH4 in the synthesis of thread H2L8?
data.answer: LiAlH4 is used to reduce the intermediate to yield the thread H2L8.

data.question: Why is Pd/C used in the synthesis of H4L7?
data.answer: Pd/C is used as a catalyst for hydrogenation to remove double bonds in the synthesis of H4L7.
